mapper.select: select count(*) from tblAWC awc join vwAttractionList al ON awc.attraction_seq = al.attraction_seq

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT n.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM ( SELECT al.*, awc.is_test, w.awc_match_count, w.awc_win_count, fw.awc_final_win_count FROM tblAWC awc JOIN vwAttractionList al ON awc.attraction_seq = al.attraction_seq JOIN tblAWCWin w ON w.attraction_seq = al.attraction_seq JOIN tblAWCFinalWin fw ON fw.attraction_seq = al.attraction_seq ) n ) where rnum between #{startIndex} and #{endIndex}

select al.*, awc.is_test, w.awc_match_count, w.awc_win_count, fw.awc_final_win_count from vwAttractionList al join tblAWC awc on awc.attraction_seq = al.attraction_seq join tblAWCWin w on w.attraction_seq = al.attraction_seq join tblAWCFinalWin fw on fw.attraction_seq = al.attraction_seq where awc.is_test = 'Y'
select al.* from tblAWC awc join vwAttractionList al on awc.attraction_seq = al.attraction_seq where al.close = #{close} and awc.is_test = 'Y'
select sum(awc_final_win_count) as total_awc_final_win_count from tblAWCFinalWin
mapper.insert: insert into tblAWC (awc_seq, is_test, attraction_seq) values (seqtblAWC.NEXTVAL, 'Y', #{attraction_seq})
insert into tblAWCWin (awc_win_seq, awc_match_count, awc_win_count, attraction_seq) values (seqtblAWCWin.NEXTVAL, 0, 0, #{attraction_seq})
insert into tblAWCFinalWin (awc_final_win_seq, awc_final_win_count, attraction_seq) values (seqtblAWCFinalWin.NEXTVAL, 0, #{attraction_seq})
mapper.update: update tblAWCWin set awc_match_count = awc_match_count + 1 where attraction_seq = #{attractionSeq}
update tblAWCWin set awc_win_count = awc_win_count + 1 where attraction_seq = #{attractionSeq}
update tblAWCFinalWin set awc_final_win_count = awc_final_win_count + 1 where attraction_seq = #{attractionSeq}
